description:
Alberta Premier Danielle Smith had to hold back tears during an update about a wildfire that had ravaged the town of Jasper, a historical mountain town in Alberta in the Rocky Mountains. “For many generations the town of Jasper and the park surrounding it have been a source of pride with some of the most […]

The post Alberta Premier Danielle Smith Still Won’t Mention Wildfire Links to Climate Change appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Alberta Premier Danielle Smith Still Won’t Mention Wildfire Links to Climate Change
